txt.en: The stone beneath Thorin's Gate is honeycombed by cave-claw burrows. If the damage continues, the entire area could be weakened enough to collapse in upon itself.

<rgb=#00e4ff>This quest has been restored for Legendary Servers!</rgb>

'Blasted nuisances! Even the dullest dwarf knows that you don't over-mine a cavern. Riddle it with holes, and the whole floor is apt to collapse. Well, the cave-claws don't know that and their incessant digging is going to be the ruin of us all! 

'What? You expect the Dourhands to do something about it? A clever jest, but I'm not laughing. Can you lend us some aid in dealing with the pests? The cave-claws, mind you...not the Dourhands. Although....

'Be that as it may, the Rockbelly Pit is overrun with cave-claws. Head east and up the hill to Winterheight. The entrance to the Pit is there.'

Cave-claws are found near the buildings and caves to the east of Thorin's Gate and inside the Rockbelly Pit caves near Winterheight, south-east of the Frerin's Court.\n\nBolli asked you to defeat cave-claws found throughout Thorin's Gate.
'You certainly took care of that problem. I'll see to it that the Dourhands do their part from now on.'
Bolli can be found in Frerin's Court.\n\nYou should return to Bolli with news of your success.
'Cave-claws! I hate them! Always ripping up the ground, leaving piles of earth in their wake. And who has to clean up their mess? The Longbeards, that's who!\n\n'Give us a hand, will you?'
'You did a good thing back there!'
'You did a good thing back there!'
Talk to Bolli in Frerin's Court
